description: Dive into the world of motion design, creative interaction, and AI-enhanced workflows. Discover innovative uses of Three.js for immersive video-textured 3D projects and explore the evolving landscape of PWAs. Open source tools like Gradient.style are making waves, alongside CSS advancements in gradient creation and animation techniques. Modern CSS empowers developers to create interactive experiences, from animated shopping carts to stateful elevators, while exploring new browser capabilities like Safari's `random()` function.
joke: Why don't HTML and CSS get along? Because they always need to style their differences!
challenge: Create an interactive photo gallery that uses WebGL to map images onto a rotating 3D cube. Add functionality for users to click on a face of the cube to view the image in full screen, and incorporate subtle animations to enhance the user experience. Use Three.js for the 3D effects, and experiment with CSS for smooth transitions between states.
